plot: Music critic Seong-hee's wife has run away. The only things she has left him is a farewell note and the cell phone she used ten years ago. With a friend he goes on a road-trip through his wife's hidden past.
title: Jipnaon Namjadeul
plot_es: Music critic Seong-hee's wife has run away. The only things she has left him is a farewell note and the cell phone she used ten years ago. With a friend he goes on a road-trip through his wife's hidden past.
plot_en: Music critic Seong-hee's wife has run away. The only things she has left him is a farewell note and the cell phone she used ten years ago. With a friend he goes on a road-trip through his wife's hidden past.
